Text: Ok - got rid of the 'clicking' for ya - there is still very occasional juddering - this is due to the source material and not the encoding process. Comments appreciated but there is nothing further I can do with E01 or E02. E03 onwards as you know are fine. Thanx for your patience...

Dude thanks a lot (toda) for the upload! Loving this show. I enjoyed Homeland but Hatufim is much nicer.

I already watched all episodes from 1 to 5. I've been looking all over for episodes 6 to 10, but I could only find it in Hebrew. Any chance you could upload the next ones? :) Thanks!

I'm uploading them at the rate of 1 per week - 6th Episode will arrive on Saturday along with some other torrents - click my username to see what kind of shows I provide...
